|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7688AN; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 575 / 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L25635FMI-10G; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU64M16HG-ACI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink 4.3.0.0; |stockos = Linux;3.18.21;OpenWrt 15.05 + linkit

|serial = yes,, (57600 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 8-pad header,,

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = integrated |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7688AN :@580MHz (MIPS 24KEc) *Memory: 128MB SDRAM (DDR2) *Onboard Storage: 32MB (NOR), :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Wi-Fi: 802.11bgn 1T1R *USB: 1x USB 2.0 port *Power: USB Female Micro-B
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.seeedstudio.com/wiki/LinkIt_Smart_7688 ''LinkIt Smart 7688'' on '''Seeed''' Wiki] *[http://labs.MediaTek.com/en/platform/linkit-smart-7688#HDK ''LinkIt Smart 7688'' at '''MediaTek''' Labs]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/12/01/MediaTek-linkit-smart-7688-and-smart-7688-duo-boards-run-openwrt-for-iot-applications/ ''MediaTek LinkIt Smart 7688 and Smart 7688 DUO Boards'' on '''CNX|Software'''] :''Run OpenWrt for IoT Applications'' *[http://linuxgizmos.com/tiny-iot-sbc-runs-openwrt-on-MediaTek-mips-soc/ ''Tiny, $13 IoT SBC runs OpenWrt on MediaTek MIPS SoC'' on '''CNX|Software''']
